aws_dms_endpoint.description: Provides a DMS (Data Migration Service) endpoint resource.

database_name.description: The name of the endpoint database.

endpoint_type.description: The type of endpoint. Can be one of `source | target`.

engine_name.description: The type of engine for the endpoint. Can be one of `aurora | aurora-postgresql| azuredb | db2 | docdb | dynamodb | elasticsearch | kinesis | mariadb | mongodb | mysql | oracle | postgres | redshift | s3 | sqlserver | sybase`.

extra_connection_attributes.description: Additional attributes associated with the connection. For available attributes see [Using Extra Connection Attributes with AWS Database Migration Service](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/dms/latest/userguide/CHAP_Introduction.ConnectionAttributes.html).

password.description: The password to be used to login to the endpoint database.

port.description: The port used by the endpoint database.

server_name.description: The host name of the server.

ssl_mode.description: The SSL mode to use for the connection. Can be one of `none | require | verify-ca | verify-full`

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

username.description: The user name to be used to login to the endpoint database.

mongodb_settings.description: Settings for the source MongoDB endpoint. Available settings are `auth_type` (default: `password`), `auth_mechanism` (default: `default`), `nesting_level` (default: `none`), `extract_doc_id` (default: `false`), `docs_to_investigate` (default: `1000`

s3_settings.description: Settings for the target S3 endpoint. Available settings are `service_access_role_arn`, `external_table_definition`, `csv_row_delimiter` (default: `\\n`), `csv_delimiter` (default: `,`), `bucket_folder`, `bucket_name` and `compression_type` (default: `NONE`). For more details, see [Using Amazon S3 as a Target for AWS Database Migration Service](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/dms/latest/userguide/CHAP_Target.S3.html).

elasticsearch_settings.description: Settings for the target Elasticsearch. Available settings are `service_access_role_arn`, `endpoint_uri`, `error_retry_duration` (default: `300`

kinesis_settings.description: Settings for the target Kinesis endpoint. Available settings are `message_format`, `service_access_role_arn`, and `stream_arn`. For more details, see [Using Amazon Kinesis Data Streams as a Target for AWS Database Migration Service](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/dms/latest/userguide/CHAP_Target.Kinesis.html).

endpoint_arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the endpoint.
